gush.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if a liquid gushes, it flows or pours out quickly and in large quantities
gush.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Water gushed from the broken pipe.
He opened the door and smoke gushed out.
gush.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if something gushes a liquid, the liquid pours out quickly and in large quantities
gush.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to express your praise, pleasure etc in a way that other people think is too strong
gush.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: ‘I simply loved your book, ’ she gushed.
gush.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: if words or emotions gush out, you suddenly express them very strongly
gush.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: All that pent-up frustration gushed out in a torrent of abuse.
gush.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a large quantity of something, usually a liquid, that suddenly pours out of something
